author: rcm
msg: Fixed action helper so if no value adapter is created for the default value then an object adapter is created.  This fixes #497.

author: rcm
msg: Now when application window is resized or maximized the root view (the desktop/workspace) has the new size specified.  This ensures that any views within the desktop will be reduced so they fit within that area.  Before, the size of the root view was set up after the subviews were laid out.  Fixes #506 & #507.

author: rcm
msg: FieldContents now provide an is-mandatory flag idicating a field must have an entry.
